title: Rotational inertia of a spinning satellite

content.prompt: A satellite that is a spinning cylinder has initial rotational inertia IÂ­0 and angular velocity w0. Solar panels unfold from the satellite and are extended outward. The satellite then has rotational inertia If = aI0 and angular velocity wf = bw0, where a and b are constants. Which of the following is true about the constants a and b?

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
